lead_paragraph: A New Jersey doctor was indicted Thursday on charges that he sold prescriptions for addictive opioid painkillers to people who had no medical need for them, including one man who died from an overdose.
snippet: A New Jersey doctor was indicted Thursday on charges that he sold prescriptions for addictive opioid painkillers to people who had no medical need for them, including one man who died from an overdose....

headline.main: Apple, IBM, Microsoft Back Transgender Teen at Supreme Court
headline.print_headline: Apple, IBM, Microsoft Back Transgender Teen at Supreme Court
